mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT SI_NO, CASE WHEN SI_NAME LIKE '%남도%' THEN SUBSTR(SI_NAME,1,2)||'도' WHEN SI_NAME LIKE '%북도%' THEN SUBSTR(SI_NAME,1,2)||'도' ELSE SUBSTR(SI_NAME, 1, 2) END AS SI_NAME FROM REGION
